content: We accept all major credit cards including Visa, MasterCard, and American Express. We also support PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. Cryptocurrency is currently not accepted.
If your transaction is declined, please check your daily spending limit or ensure your card is activated for online use. Contact your bank if the issue persists.
Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Expedited shipping arrives in 2-3 days. Orders placed before 2 PM EST are shipped the same day.
To return an item, visit the 'My Orders' page and click 'Request Return'. Print the prepaid shipping label and drop the package at any authorized courier location within 30 days.
Once we receive your return, refunds are initiated immediately. However, it may take 5-10 business days for the funds to reflect in your bank account depending on your financial institution.
Forgot your credentials? Click the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page. Enter your registered email to receive a secure reset link valid for 60 minutes.
You can track your package in real-time. Log in to your account, go to 'Order History', and click on the tracking number to see the latest courier updates.
We offer three tiers: Basic ($10/month), Pro ($29/month), and Enterprise (Custom pricing). Annual billing offers a 20% discount compared to monthly billing.
You can cancel your active membership anytime from the 'Billing Settings' tab. Your access will remain active until the end of the current billing cycle.
We ship globally to over 150 countries. Customs duties and import taxes are calculated at checkout and are the responsibility of the customer.
Your data security is our priority. We use end-to-end encryption and strictly adhere to GDPR and CCPA regulations. We never sell your personal data to third parties.
Developers can generate API keys from the dashboard under 'Integrations'. Rate limits are set to 1000 requests per minute for Pro users.
For orders exceeding 50 units, we offer wholesale pricing. Please contact our sales team at sales@company.com for a custom quote and volume discounts.
Our official mobile app is available on both the Apple App Store and Google Play Store. It features exclusive app-only deals and push notifications for order updates.
If you wish to permanently remove your profile, navigate to 'Privacy Settings' and select 'Delete Account'. Warning: This action is irreversible and erases all history.
Gift cards can be redeemed at checkout by entering the unique 16-digit code in the promo box. Balance does not expire and can be used across multiple orders.
All electronic devices come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty covering defects. Accidental damage is not covered unless an extended protection plan was purchased.
Earn commissions by referring new customers! Sign up for our affiliate program to get a unique referral link. Payouts are processed monthly via PayPal.
Need help? Our support team operates 24/7. Start a live chat on our website or email us at support@company.com. Phone support is available during business hours.
Orders can be modified or canceled within 30 minutes of placement. After that window, the order is processed for shipping and cannot be changed.
Students with a valid .edu email address are eligible for a 15% discount on all products. Verify your student status via ID.me at checkout.
For your protection, high-value orders may trigger a manual security review. You might receive a call or email to verify authorization before shipment.
Subscribe to our weekly newsletter to receive updates on new arrivals and exclusive promotions. You can unsubscribe at any time via the link in the email footer.
We are committed to the environment. All our packaging materials are 100% recyclable and sourced from sustainable forests.
Want to join our team? Check out our 'Careers' page for current openings. We are a remote-first company hiring globally.
